column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Amazing!  I loved it.  The atmosphere is dark
column3: and intimate.  The drinks are fabulous.  The food
column5: the food!  The oysters were delicious
column6: the goat cheese app was perfect.  My filet was cooked perfect medium rare and was seasoned just right.  The sides (we had this delicious spicy corn
column7: fries & creamed spinach) were very memorable.  The fries are fried in pork fat
column8: but they're not greasy and the flavor is not overpowering.  I could go on and on - but basically everything is amazing and I'm going back ASAP.
